text: Another addition to the brood : Tori Spelling and her family buy a pet dog to add to their big clan She'll already have a shopping list of nappies and wet wipes ready for the new arrival, and now Tori Spelling will have to add pet food and bones. The former Beverly Hills 90210 actress visited the Malibu Farmer's Market on Sunday - but instead of groceries, she went home with a puppy. It's understandable to see why Tori was bowled over by the Labrador, as the gorgeous pooch rest its head on her lap. New member of the clan : Tori Spelling and her family buy a pet Labrador Sidetracked : Family headed out for groceries and came home with a dog H usband Dean McDermott was also in tow
